recentWork.title: Add --verbose flag to bff commit, precommit, and amend
recentWork.description: Improve output clarity by showing concise output by default: - Add --verbose flag to precommit command to control output verbosity - Update commit command to pass --verbose flag to precommit - Update amend command to support --verbose flag - Documentation updates for all three commands  By default, pre-commit checks now show only pass/fail with timing

recentWork.title: test: improve test environment and PostHog client cleanup
recentWork.description: - Add test-specific environment variables to prevent 1Password popups during tests - Set BF_SECRETS_NEXT_UPDATE to far future timestamp in test environment - Add cleanupPosthog() function for proper client shutdown - Configure PostHog client to flush immediately (flushAt: 1, flushInterval: 0) - Clear global posthogClient reference after shutdown to prevent memory leaks - Save and restore friendMap state in ai

recentWork.title: test: improve database test cleanup and connection handling
recentWork.description: - Add proper cleanup for metadata handling test to prevent orphaned nodes - Add connection close and delays between database backend tests to prevent conflicts - Store node IDs for cleanup and delete created test nodes - Ensure each backend test fully closes connections before proceeding to next - Add try/finally blocks to guarantee cleanup even on test failures  These changes prevent test flakiness and ensure proper resource cleanup between database backend tests (Neon, PostgreSQL, and SQLite)
